about_the_game:
Duel Map! ⚔️ Build an Importing Empire - foreign cities that you can only import from.

Detailed Rules of Map:
  • 🗺️ Map for 2 players!
  • 🏘️ When you Urbanize a town, it is forbidden to add any Goods cubes to the new city.
  • 🏞 Players may only lay a maximum of 2 tracks on their turn. The Engineer Action allows players to lay 3 tracks instead of 2.
  • 🏰 White cities are Foreign cities that you can only import from. You may never deliver Goods cubes to, or transport Goods cubes through these cities. Once you import any Goods cubes from a Foreign city, importing cubes from the other Foreign city is prohibited for you for the rest of the game.
  • 🤸 When you select an action tile, you may not select it again during the next turns until your opponent selects it.
